creator: rares.doghi@softvision.ro
summary: The User is unable to delete the Highlighter points  [DevTools Shaping Tool]

comments.text:
[Affected versions]:
- Nightly 62.0a1

[Affected platforms]:
- Platforms: Windows 10 x 64, Windows 7 x 32, Mac OS X 10.12 and Ubuntu 16.04 x64.

[Steps to reproduce]:
1. 1. Go to about:config and set "layout.css.shape-outside.enabled" to true.
2. Go to https://meyerweb.com/eric/thoughts/2017/03/20/handiwork/
3. Right click on the "Red Kitchen Aid" image and then click on "Inspect Element".
4. Click on the button displayed next to shape-outside to toggle the shape tool on.
5. Double Click any of the Highlighter points in order to delete them.


[Expected result]:
- The Highlighter Points should disappear when double clicked.

[Actual result]:
- The User is unable to delete any of the highlighter points.

Please note that the user is still able to add them by double clicking anywhere on the line.
